T02TD2105E:135a-1: dzny'a na satva manydzu shr'i sa ra siddhi na ma ;
T02TD2105E:135a-3: 'jam 'pal ye shes sems dpa'i snying po grub pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2105E:135a-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2105E:135a-5: phyag rgya chen por 'gro ba kun gnas pa //
T02TD2105E:135a-6: 'od gsal rang byung yid kyis gus phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2105E:135a-7: 'gro ba rnams la ji ltar bden don nyid //
T02TD2105E:135a-8: sems dpa'i ye shes 'gag pa med par bshad //
T02TD2105E:135a-9: 'das dang ma 'ongs da lta dus rnams su //
T02TD2105E:135a-10: dus gsum mnyam pa'i sku shar gzhan rgyu med //
T02TD2105E:135a-11: de phyir yang dag mtshan brjod go ba yis //
T02TD2105E:135a-12: 'khor 'das ye shes sems dpa'i lus rig bya //
T02TD2105E:135a-13: rdul dang mun pa snying stobs gsum gyi bdag / de nyid yin phyir sems kyis sun mi dbyung //
T02TD2105E:135a-14: phung po lnga yi khur bor nyan thos rnams //
T02TD2105E:135a-15: lam gyi dang por 'bad de gzung bar bya //
T02TD2105E:135a-16: rang rgyal theg pa bag med spong ba'i phyir //
T02TD2105E:135a-17: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don la bslab //
T02TD2105E:135a-18: dge chos tshol la dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten ;
T02TD2105E:135a-19: / shes rab gsum ni shes rab kyis shes bya //
T02TD2105E:135a-20: zad pa shes pas rnam par dag 'gyur te //
T02TD2105E:135a-21: skye med shes pas ye shes lus su 'gyur //
T02TD2105E:135a-22: skad cig gcig la rnam par grol ba ni //
T02TD2105E:135a-23: rang rig ngo bor sangs rgyas thams cad 'chang //
T02TD2105E:135a-24: yul dang dbang po bde bar byin brlabs pas//
T02TD2105E:135a-25: ye shes sems dpa'i lus su bdag rdzogs 'gyur //
T02TD2105E:135a-26: thams cad dge bar mthong bas mi dge med //
T02TD2105E:135a-27: snying rje chen po'i cha las sna tshogs gzugs //
T02TD2105E:135a-28: rgyu lam 'bras bu kun du dgag mi bya //
T02TD2105E:135a-29: shes rab pha rol phyin pas stong pa nyid //
T02TD2105E:135a-30: dus gsum du ni mi gnas 'pho ba med //
T02TD2105E:135a-31: bde ba chen po'i mngal du yid zhugs na //
T02TD2105E:135a-32: rnal 'byor yid la mi byed bla ma'i sku //
T02TD2105E:135a-33: yul dang gnyen por bcas dang mthong ba dang //
T02TD2105E:135a-34: der shes pa dang nu ba pa'i ye shes nyid //
T02TD2105E:135a-35: rtsa ba bral ba'i sems ni brtan pa la //
T02TD2105E:135a-36: rgod dang g-yeng ba'i dri mas gos mi 'gyur //
T02TD2105E:135b-0: rang 'byung ye shes brtan dang thos @135b pa yis //
T02TD2105E:135b-1: brtags pa'i rgyu ba rnams la gnas pa med //
T02TD2105E:135b-2: 'khrul pa zhig pas snang ba'i rgyu ba bral //
T02TD2105E:135b-3: dbye ba spangs pa ye shes sems dpa'i gnas //
T02TD2105E:135b-4: yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig bying rmugs med //
T02TD2105E:135b-5: nges 'byung mtha' la gnas pa the tshom med //
T02TD2105E:135b-6: rgyun chad med pa'i ye shes 'gyod pa spangs//
T02TD2105E:135b-7: nyon mongs gnyen po mi byed le lo min //
T02TD2105E:135b-8: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pas zhum pa med //
T02TD2105E:135b-9: 'khor ba rnam par dag pas gnyid sogs bral //
T02TD2105E:135b-10: yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2105E:135b-11: rang bzhin chos la gnas pas thob bya spangs //
T02TD2105E:135b-12: rdo rje lta bu yin phyir bdud tham gyur //
T02TD2105E:135b-13: dgos pa med pa'i gnas thob shin tu bde //
T02TD2105E:135b-14: kun rdzob rnam par dag pas ae ma mtshar //
T02TD2105E:135b-15: bcom ldan mgon po gang gi lung thob pas //
T02TD2105E:135b-16: rgyud dngos grub pa sgrub pa'i thabs 'di bya //
T02TD2105E:135b-17: phun sum tshogs 'gyur tshogs gnyis 'bras bu gang //
T02TD2105E:135b-18: 'gro ba rnams kyis dus 'dir rnyed par shog /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i snying po grub pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2105E:135b-19: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2105E:135b-21: // / rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'irtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
